answers.answer: Have you tried the raw life style perhaps 2 meals a day instead of going fully raw!!! Good luck!!!

What type of diabetes do you have?  Type I or Type II?  Basically, they both require a low glycemic diet, but weight loss is more difficult with type II than with type I, because of the possibility of other conditions, accompanying it.

My mother-in-law had type two diabetes she was constantly hungry she would say she was just starving after she ate I would suggest increasing your water intake and that might help with the physical sensations but for the low glucose you might want to check with your doctor and see if your insulin levels are okay. Or if you need a dose adjustment

question: I can't loose weight due to my diabetes any suggestions.
title: diabetes and and weight loss
